attributes.action: LUSH must end this distasteful attack on our police service
attributes.background:
The PaidToLie campaign by Lush is despicable, it portrays the image of a completely corrupt Police Service.

The lack of intervention by our government or regulatory bodies is disgraceful.

I call on all of us to stand to together and oppose this senseless, money motivated campaign.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of Lush, not the UK Government or Parliament.
